articles.description: Former Nickelodeon producer Dan Schneider is suing the makers of the documentary “Quiet on Set: The Dark Side of Kids TV" for implying that he sexually abused children. The defamation suit was filed Wednesday in a Los Angeles court aainst Warner Bros. Discove…
articles.content: LOS ANGELES (AP) Former Nickelodeon producer and writer Dan Schneider sued the makers of Quiet on Set: The Dark Side of Kids TV on Wednesday, alleging the makers of the documentary series wrongly imp… [+3925 chars]

articles.title: Andy Cohen addresses 'Vanderpump Rules' production pause ahead of Season 12 - Page Six
articles.description: Cohen thinks it’s a “very good idea” for the cast to get some time off after filming Seasons 10 and 11 nearly back to back due to Scandoval.
articles.content:
Andy Cohen thinks the “Vanderpump Rules” pause is for the better.

articles.title: Duane Eddy, Grammy-Winning ‘Peter Gunn’ Guitarist, Dies at 86 - Variety
articles.description: Duane Eddy, guitarist with hits in the late ‘50s and early ‘60s including the theme to TV series "Peter Gunn" and "Rebel Rouser," died April 30.
articles.content: Duane Eddy, who became the first stand-alone rock ‘n’ roll guitar star with a string of instrumental hits in the late ‘50s and early ‘60s including the theme to TV series “Peter Gunn” and “Rebel Rous… [+6371 chars]
